findings.title: Wrong burning
findings.description: Sending tokens to the dead address instead of burning them in the token contract.

findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The updateEmissionRate function can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward lionReward in function updatePool will be incorrect.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to drain tokens, change operator, and modify various parameters such as transfer tax rate, burn rate, max transfer amount, and min amount to liquify.
